description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken With Cherry Hazelnut Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Chicken With Cherry Hazelnut Stuffing
name: Roast Chicken With Cherry Hazelnut Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, breast-side down, on a rack in a roasting pan. Cook for 20 minutes. Turn chicken over, breast-side up, reduce temperature to 180°C. Add pan with remaining stuffing to oven and cook alongside chicken for a further 1 hour or until golden, and juices run clear when thickest part of the thigh is pierced with a skewer. Spoon some of the chicken juices over the stuffing halfway through cooking time. Garnish chicken with fresh sage leaves and serve with cherry and hazelnut stuffing.
